pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Doomsday Engine allows you to play the classic first-person shooters DOOM, Heretic, and Hexen using modern technology, with hardware accelerated 3D graphics, surround sound and much more.

use.flag: Install launcher dor doom1.wad from games-fps/doom-data
Enable support for media-sound/fluidsynth (provides only MIDI music; requires a soundfont)
Enable support for media-libs/fmod (provides sfx and music; requires a soundfont to support MIDI/MUS)
Install launcher for doom1.wad from games-fps/freedoom
Adds support for the Open Audio Library (provides sfx with 3D but not music)
Enable support for games-fps/doomsday-resources in jdoom launcher
Enable support for media-libs/sdl-mixer (provides sfx and music)
